wikipedia_page.main: David Weir (29 August 1863 – 1 December 1933)  was an English footballer who played for several clubs in the 19th century, including Bolton Wanderers and Ardwick (Manchester City), and won two caps for England.

response: * David Weir (Scottish footballer) (born 1970), Scottish footballer and football manager
* David Weir (writer) (1934–2011), British TV and film script writer
* David Weir (athlete) (born 1979), British Paralympic wheelchair athlete
